Nelson en el momento no cuenta con capital de trabajo para retomar su negocio es por ello que acude a la ayuda de un préstamo para invertir en la compra de 4 lechones, reconstruir su cochera y el respectivo alimento de sus cerdos.
Este préstamo le dará la posibilidad de retomar una actividad económica para su propio sostenimiento, aspira en unos años poder tener una granja con mínimo 500 cerdos y se compromete a trabajar duramente para que cuando vuelva a solicitar un préstamo sea para alimentar sus 500 cerdos
texts.en:
Nelson, 28, is single and has no partner nor children, only his faithful dog who goes wherever he does.  He used to have a pig raising business that he closed in order to venture into another activity but it was not what he had expected.  Now he wants to go back into the old business and start from scratch.

Nelson does not have the work capital he needs for his project so he is requesting a loan to buy four piglets, animal feed and to rebuild a shed.  The loan will allow him to restart the business so he can support himself.  He hopes that in two years' time he will have at least 500 pigs.  He is committed to working hard so he can feed the 500 pigs and pay back the loan.

loans.use: To reactivate his economy buying pigs and feed, and repairing a shed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of window glass.

loans.name: Jose Lisandro

texts.es:
José es un comerciante de la zona de Itagüí, se dedica a atender su negocio de ferretería, vende productos como pinturas, tubos, pegamentos, clavos, destornilladores, extensiones, claves, varillas, tornillos, cemento, entre otra variedad de productos. Con este negocio logra generar el sustento para su familia, su esposo, y sus tres hijos dos de ellas mujeres. 
José aprendió del negocio gracias a que en su juventud tenia empleos en almacenes similares de lo que ahora tiene. Con su negocio se ha proyectado para comprar una vivienda propia, quiere dejarles a sus hijos una herencia que tengan una vivienda propia si quiera para afrontar la vida.
 Con la ayuda de un préstamo José quiere lograr el siguiente impacto en su negocio que es: mejorar sus ventas, aumentar los clientes, diversificar su oferta de productos, mejorar su local, lo hará invirtiendo en compra de surtido de concreto, adobes, herramienta de mano, pintura y variedad de clavos y tornillos.
texts.en:
Jose is a merchant in the area of Itagüí.  He runs a hardware store and sells goods such as paints, pipes, glues, nails, screwdrives, extension cords, rods, screws, cement and other products.  Through his business he is able to support his family: a wife and three children (a son and two daughters).

Jose learned the business from having worked in his youth in similar shops.  With his business he plans to buy his own home and leave property to his children so they will have something in life.

With the help of the loan Jose wants to boost his business through increased sales, more customers, product diversification and shop improvement.  He plans to buy concrete, adobe, hand tools, paint and a variety of nails and screws.

loans.use: To buy concrete, adobe, hand tools, paint and a variety of nails and screws.

loans.name: Luz Alba

texts.es:
Esta adorable mujer es Luz, es una mujer soltera de 58 años de edad que sale todas las mañanas a buscarse su propio sustento ya que no logro tener hijos y no tiene pareja, su negocio trata de una venta de dulces, café, perico (café con leche), buñuelos, frituras en bolsa, dulces, chocolates, chicles, entre otros productos. 
Para ella lo más importante es lograr tener una sostenibilidad y durabilidad de su negocio, esto es lo único que tiene para comer y si llegara a perderlo no sabría que le depararía el destino. 
Luz quiere recurrir a un apoyo a su buen corazón para que la ayuden a seguir ejerciendo su profesión, necesita comprar surtido de productos de confitería como dulces y chocolates y quiere comprar insumos para iniciar a preparar almuerzos una buena alternativa para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
This adorable lady is Luz.  She is 58 and single and goes out every morning to work to support herself since she has neither a partner nor children.  In her business she sells sweets, coffee, doughnuts, fried snacks, chocolate, chewing gum and other products.

For her, the most important thing is sustainability and duration in her business.  It is her only source of income and she does not know what would happen to her if she lost it.

Luz is seeking your support so she can grow in her profession.  She wants to buy a variety of confectionery goods like pastries and chocolate, as well as supplies to start selling mid-morning snacks to improve her income.

loans.use: To buy a variety of pastries, chocolate and supplies to start selling breakfast and mid-morning snacks.

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz Amparo es una mujer soltera, tiene 54 años de edad se desempeña como vendedora de abarrotes en un negocio que heredó de su familia y que hasta el día de hoy  logra mantener en pie. Su negocio mantiene abierto por 16 horas cada día de la semana pero para aguantar tal carga de trabajo cuenta con l ayuda de una persona y juntas han sacado este negocio familiar adelante.
Luz Amparo no tiene hijos su amor en el momento es su negocio. Quiere mejorar, vender productos nuevos, tener sostenibilidad, ser competente, en pocas palabras trabajar en su negocio hasta que su salud se lo permita pues de verdad lo ha aprendido a amar.
Luz Amparo quiere solicitar un apoyo para la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar en general, productos de aseo personal, como lo son jabones, papel higiénico, talco, crema dental, limpiadores, detergentes, esponjas, escobas, aceite, granos en general.
texts.en:
Luz Amparo is a single woman, age 54, who works as a grocery saleswoman in a business that she inherited from her family and to date has managed to keep going. Her business is open 16 hours per day, every day of the week, but to endure such a workload, she has the help of one person and together they have gotten this family business ahead.

Luz Amparo doesn't have children, her love at the moment is her business. She wants to improve, sell new products, have sustainability, be competent, and, in short, work in her business until her health doesn't allow her to anymore since she has really learned to love it. 

Luz Amparo wants to ask for a loan to purchase an assortment of products for the family pantry, personal care supplies, such as soaps, toilet paper, talcum powder, toothpaste, cleaners, detergents, sponges, brooms, oil and general grains.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of personal care supplies, such as soaps, toilet paper, talcum powder, toothpaste, cleaners, detergents, sponges, brooms, oil and general grains.

loans.name: Mujeres De Bien Group

texts.es:
MUJERES DE BIEN
Este dúo formado por doña Marta, de 29 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos y es casada, nos cuenta que vende ropa típica desde hace 5 años, se va a diferentes lugares como Llano de la Virgen, Pamoca, y Cerro Alto,  4 veces a la semana a vender blusas, cortes, delantales, y cuando le piden trae güipiles ya que esos tiene otro precio, y  por las mañanas vende granizadas en su casa, con su trabajo ayuda a su esposo con los gastos ya que están ahorrando para comprar un terreno porque en donde viven es terreno de su papa, el sueño es poder lograr tener su propia casa. Por eso solicita la ayuda de fape para poder invertir en su negocio de ropa y así obtener un poco mas de ganancias.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Mujeres de Bien" has two members.  Marta, 29, is married and has two children.  She says she has been selling typical clothing for five years in different areas such as Llano de la Virgen, Pamoca and Cerro Alto.  Four times a week she sells blouses, skirts, aprons and, upon demand, "güipiles" (regional blouses) which has a different price.  In the morning she sells frozen drinks from home.  With her income and help from her husband she is able to cover expenses and save to buy land which is good for growing potatoes.

Her dream is to have her own house, so she is requesting a loan through FAPE for her clothing business to earn a little more.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es: Mauricio, tiene 34 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 4 hijos, reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de granos básicos desde hace 15 años. El cuenta con su propia finca de café, el cual vende en pergamino húmedo y seco. Ha decidido obtener un prestamo por 6,000 lempiras para comprar abonos y fertilizar la finca y para cubrir gastos de trabajadores. Su plan es mejorar la producción, cultivar mas café y poderle dar mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Mauricio is 34 years old, married, has 4 children, and lives in a village in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. He has always worked growing basic grains for the past 15 years. He has his own coffee plantation; he sells it as wet and dry Pergamino. He has decided to get a loan of 6,000 lempiras to purchase manure and fertilize the plantation, and to pay the expense of laborers. His plan is to improve his production, grow more coffee, and be able to give his family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase manure and pay for labor to provide assistance on the coffee plantation.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 21 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su madre y su hermana, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón  solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así ella y su familia puedan vivir más seguras y cómodas.
texts.en: The young woman's face is pixelated because she is 21 years old and lives in a high risk area. She has had a small store located in her residence for several years. With what she obtains from her sales she is able to pay for some of her household expenses. She lives in her own home with her mother and her sister. She wants to improve her home by building a wall in the area shown in the photograph but what she obtains from her sales is not enough to do it. That is why she is asking for a loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, and iron, as well as to pay for labor. This way, she and her family can live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and iron, as well as to pay for labor.

loans.name: Massan

texts.fr: Agée de 45 ans, Massan vit à Agoè. Veuve avec ses six enfants à charge, Massan s’active efficacement pour nourrir ses enfants. Pour rendre ses efforts bénéfiques, Massan fait le commerce des piments en parcourant les quartiers environnant et les marchés. Massan achète quatre fois par mois sa marchandise afin de les revendre pour avoir un bon profit. Massan demande ce crédit pour commander des sacs de piments et trouver le bénéfice pour favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Massan is 45 years old and lives in Agoè.  She is a widow and has six children in her care.  Massan works hard and manages to feed her children.  To do this, she sells chillies on foot in her neighbourhood and at the markets.  

In order to maintain her stock levels, Massan buys new supplies four times a month, which she then sells and makes a good profit.  She has requested this loan to buy sacks of chillies to increase her revenue and provide for the education expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of chillies for resale.

loans.name: Blanca Ines

texts.es:
La historia de Blanca es una linda historia de superación, fuerza de voluntad y amor por la familia, ella es una mujer de 37 años de edad que por circunstancias de la vida quedo Viuda, ella es madre de tres hijas adolescentes, al saber de la noticia de su pareja, entre una depresión pero fue el amor por su familia la que hizo levantar cabeza e iniciar a buscar alternativas para generar ingresos. 
Ella gracias a las enseñanzas de su cuñado, a que no la abandono y estuvo a su lado inicio con un negocio de confección y fue gracias a este negocio que ha logrado generar el sustento para sus, en la foto se ve ella trabajando en su pequeña habitación y en el cuadro dos de sus hijas con sus vestidos de 15 años, esta mujer se ha esforzado enormemente para que sus hijas vivan bellos momentos de la vida.
Blanca viene algo penosa pero con necesidad a solicitar una ayuda y es que quiere iniciar con la confección de su propia línea de ropa y para ello necesita de una maquina fileteadora, el préstamo que se encuentra solicitando es para comprar una, el resto de capital lo invertirá en la compra de telas para la elaboración de pijamas inicialmente de mujer y niña.
texts.en:
Blanca’s story is a touching story of overcoming hardship, strength of will and family love. 

Blanca is a 37 year old woman who, due to circumstances beyond her control, was widowed. As a mother of three teenage daughters, when she heard the news of what had happened to her partner she sunk into depression, but it was the love for her family that made her get back on her feet and start looking for ways to generate an income.

Thanks to the lessons of her brother-in-law, who did not abandon her but stood by her side, Blanca began a business making clothes. It was thanks to this business that she was able to make enough to feed and clothe her children. In the photo you can see Blanca working in her small room and in the picture you can see two of her daughters in their 15th birthday dresses. This woman has made an enormous effort so that her daughters can enjoy beautiful moments in their lives.

Blanca is somewhat embarrassed to ask but she needs some help because she wants to start making her own line of clothing and for this she will need an overlock sewing machine. The loan that she is applying for will be used to buy one and the rest of the capital will be used to purchase fabric to make pyjamas, initially for women and girls.

loans.use: to start making her own line of clothing and buy fabric and supplies to make pyjamas

loans.name: Pélagie

texts.fr: Agée de 27 ans, Pélagie est une femme qui vit à Daliko avec une personne à sa charge. Devant son domicile, Pélagie vend des céréales à ses clients et parcoure les quartiers et trouve son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Pélagie s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Pélagie demande ce crédit pour commander des sacs de maïs et de haricot afin de réaliser encore plus de revenus pour soutenir  les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
Pélagie is 27 years old and lives in Daliko.  She has one financial dependant.  Pélagie sells cereals from the front of her house and on foot in her neighbourhood.  In this way, she manages to earn a living.

In order to maintain her stock levels, Pélagie buys new supplies three times a month from the market.  She has requested this loan to buy sacks of maize and sacks of beans to increase her revenue and provide for the day-to-day expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of beans and 3 sacks of maize for resale.

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Mujeres de San Bartolo
Este dúo está formado por doña María Llanuaria, ella tiene 64 años de edad y se dedica a  la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de la terminal, y venta de orquídeas , lirios y huevos por mayor, en el mercado la cuchilla, desde ya hace muchos años, ella está solicitando el crédito para la inversión de compra de frutas y huevos para surtir su negocio, su deseo es seguir mejorando su casa, con las ganancias de su negocio.
texts.en:
Dúo Mujeres de San Bartolo

This pair was formed by Maria Llanuaria, 64, who has sold fruit and vegetables at the terminal market and orchids, irises and eggs in bulk at the la cuchilla market for many years. 

Maria is applying for a loan to purchase fruit and eggs to stock up her business. Her dream is to continue to make home improvements with the earnings from her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit to resell

loans.name: Silvia Eugenia

texts.es: Silvia de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir un muro y colocar el techo, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la comprar de ladrillos, cemento, arena, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así ella y su esposo puedan vivir más seguros y cómodos.
texts.en: Silvia is 65 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband. She has sold clothing for several years. With what she gets from her sales, she is able to pay for some household expenses. She wants to improve her home by finishing building on a wall and putting on the roof, but what she gets from her sales isn't enough to do it. That is why she is asking for a loan to buy the bricks, cement, sand, and iron, as well as to pay for the labor. This way, she and her husband can live more securely and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and iron, as well as to pay for labor.

loans.name: Irakoze Ii Group

texts.fr:
Jean fait partie du groupe  IrakozeII et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il a 38 ans et est marié à Diane, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 1 enfant âgé de 3 ans. 
Il fait le commerce du riz, du sel, de l'huile de palme,… dans sa boutique depuis 5 ans. 

Il est à son quatorzième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’ 'il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz, de sel, et d'huile palme à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter un terrain pour la culture du riz, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Jean is a member of the 'Irakoze II' Group.  He is 38 years old, married to Diane (a retailer) and lives in Bujumbura.  Together they have one three-year-old child.  

Jean has been selling rice, salt, palm oil, etc from his shop for five years.  This will be his fourteenth loan with the field partner, Turame.  He will use it to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of rice, salt and palm oil for resale.

In the coming years, Jean would like to buy a plot of land to grow rice, and see his children study.

loans.use: to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of rice, salt and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Enyonam

texts.fr: Mariée, Enyonam est âgée de 30 ans et vit avec ses trois enfants dans le quartier de Hedzranawoé. Enyonam travaille parfaitement pour venir en aide aux différents besoins de sa famille. Enyonam vend des fruits au marché pour trouver un revenu pouvant couvrir leurs charges quotidiennes. Enyonam s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au grand marché Lomé. Pour avoir plus de revenu Enyonam demande ce prêt pour acheter des avocats destinés à la vente et favoriser l’éducation de ses enfants
texts.en:
Enyonam is 30 years old, married and lives with her three children in Hedzranawoé.  She works well to provide for the different needs of her family.  Enyonam sells fruit at the market to cover the day-to-day expenses of her household.  

In order to maintain her stock levels, Enyonam buys new supplies three times a month from the main market in Lomé.  She has requested this loan to buy avocados to increase her revenue and provide for the education expenses of her children.

loans.use: to buy 1 sack of avocados for resale.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos, ella posee una tienda y una panadería desde hace 10 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro perimetral en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero con las ganancias que obtiene no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así ella y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en:
Teresa is 43 years old and lives in her own home with her five children. She has owned a shop and a bakery for the last 10 years and she is able to get by with the earnings from her sales. 

Teresa would like to make home improvements by building a perimeter wall around the area you can see in the photo, but her current income is not enough to cover the costs, which is why she is applying for a loan from Integral. Teresa will use this loan to buy cement, sand, bricks, tin sheeting and pay for labourers so that she and her family can live with more security.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, tin sheeting and pay for labourers

loans.name: Mauricio Antonio

texts.es: Mauricio de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de loroco y granos básicos, tiene prácticamente todos los años de su vida de dedicarse a esa actividad por esa razón obtiene buenos productos, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para seguir con sus cultivos y así tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and four children. He has grown loroco and staple grains for practically his entire life, which is why he obtains great results with his crops. He sells his crops in the outskirts of the area where he lives and with his income he is able to cover some of the household bills. 

Mauricio is applying for a loan to buy seeds, fertiliser, compost, pest control and improve the land that you can see in the photo so that he can continue growing his crops and obtain a higher income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno

loans.name: Edgardo

texts.es: Edgardo de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, inicio con esa actividad gracias a su padre ya que el fue quien le enseño ese trabajo, vende durante todo el año y lo comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ganado vacuno para seguir con su comercialización y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Edgardo is 35 years of age and lives in his own home with his wife and two children. He works raising cattle, a job which he begun thanks to his father who was the one who taught him this line of work. Edgardo sells cattle throughout the whole year in the neighbouring towns and from these sales he is able to cover some of the household costs. 

Edgardo is applying for a loan to buy cattle so he can continue to make sales and earn a better living.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es: Jose de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero, desde hace mas de 30 años, el trabajo lo realiza durante todo el año, comercializa sus productos durante todo el año y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado, pasto, vitaminas entre otras cosas y si poder seguir con su trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 46 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and son. He has raised dairy cattle for more than 30 years and he does this job all year round. He also sells his products throughout the whole year and from these sales he is able to cover some of the household costs.

Jose is applying for a loan to buy extract, fodder and vitamins, amongst other things, so that he can continue working towards a better quality of life together with his family.

loans.use: to buy extract, fodder and vitamins, amongst other things

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de maíz y frijol, desde hace 10 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así poder seguir con sus cultivos y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel is 32 years old. He owns a house where he lives with his wife and four children. Manuel works in agriculture. He has been growing corn and beans for ten years. He sells his produce at different markets located close to home. With the profits he makes, he manages to cover some of the home expenses.

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc., and be able to continue growing food and improving his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Estrellita De Los Angeles

texts.es: Estrellita de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, adicional a eso también vende frutas y verduras, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  insumos agrícolas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para seguir con sus cultivos y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Estrellita, 40, owns a house where she lives with her husband and four children. She works in agriculture, growing corn. She also sells fruits and vegetables at different markets located close to home.

Estrellita is requesting a loan to buy some agricultural supplies and prepare the land shown in the picture in order to continue growing food and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and prepare the land for sowing.

loans.name: Lazarus's Group

texts.en:
Lazarus's Group is formed by nine farmers in Kakamega North District and is being represented by Lazarus, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 36 years old, is married and has four children. Lazarus has been a farmer for 14 years and is often referred to as a very reliable person.

Lazarus isn’t new to One Acre Fund. He joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since. 

This year, Lazarus will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase two solar lights. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Lazarus's Group will purchase a total of five solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 6.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Yulia

texts.es:
Yulia mujer casada, determinada, sabe aprovechar sus recursos, su espacio y sus círculos, aprendió a través de un amigo la venta de mercancía como lo son productos de uso personal, desodorantes, cuchillas de afeitar, cremas de manos, productos capilares, productos faciales, perfumes entre otros, actividad que inicio en el año 2007 por necesidad económica y en la que ha venido trabajando buscando un mejor futuro para su hogar.
Los principales inconvenientes que tiene esta mujer es la inseguridad en el sitio de trabajo, está expuesta a muchos robos y clientes que no le pagan.
Su idea es seguir manteniendo su negocio en pie, no busca montar un local, ella es feliz trabajando desde su casa porque puede ejercer su papel como ama de casa.
Buscando mejorar sus ventas, sacar más provechos de sus círculos, mejorar ganancias ella quiere solicitar un préstamo para realizar un pedido en cantidad ya que le sale más rentable, comprara los productos descritos al inicio, pijamas para mujer y niña.
texts.en:
Yulia is a determined married woman who knows how to take advantage of her resources, her space and her social circles. She has learnt about the sale of merchandise such as personal hygiene products, deodorants, razor blades, hand cream, hair products, face cream and perfume, amongst others. She began this job in 2007 out of financial necessity and since then she has been working in search of a better future for her home.

The main downside that Yulia experiences is the lack of workplace safety, because she has experienced a lot of robberies and customers who don't pay her.

Yulia's idea is to continue to keep her business going. She is not looking to set up a store because she is happy to work from home where she can exercise her role as a housewife.

Wanting to improve her sales, take better advantage of her social circles and improve her earnings, Yulia is applying for a loan to place a bulk order since it works out to be cheaper. She will also buy the products described at the beginning: pyjamas for women and girls.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of products such as deodorants, razor blades, hand cream, hair products, facials and pyjamas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials like yarn and textiles for her business.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 39-year-old married woman from Jericho city. She lives with her husband and seven kids; two sons and five daughters. Her husband works as a farmer on his land. He gets a good seasonal income. Sahar has a sewing workshop. She opened it three years ago. It is a good business and supports the family with a good income.

Sahar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop. This will help her to increase her productivity and also her income.

Sahar appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her workshop.

loans.name: Maksudjon

texts.en:
Maksudjon is a clever man. He was born in 1993. He lives in a remote district. He is a fourth year student. He is single. 

Maksudjon is confident, a good communicator, and an active person. He studies at a university. His major is energy engineering. He is planning to graduate with excellence and find a job in his profession. His parents are supporting him in his prosperities and faults. He wants to be an example for others. 

Maksudjon needs to pay the university's tuition fee, and asks for a 755 USD loan for it. 

He hopes Kiva will support him.

loans.use: to pay the university tuition fee

loans.name: Neri Osvaldo

texts.es: Neri de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, ha trabajado en ese rubro desde que era un niño, tiene una Mz. de terreno propio y una alquilada, la producción es distribuida en los mercados de la zona donde el reside, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas y el alquiler del terreno y asi poder continuar con su trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Neri is 31 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and his three children. He works in farming, namely cultivating corn and beans. He has worked in this job since he was a child. He owns a manzana (1.75 acres) of land and he rents another one. He distributes his production in the markets of the area where he lives. With the sales he is able to pay for some of his household expenses. He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural inputs and to rent the land so that he can continue working and have a better quality of life, together with his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and to rent the land.

loans.name: Juvelyn

texts.en:
Juvelyn is a 27-year-old married woman and a mother of a 5-year-old child from Dulag, Leyte. 

She is engaged in vegetable-selling business. Juvelyn has been in the business for more than six years now. Juvelyn is standing next to string beans ready for selling. 

Juvelyn is asking to take a loan to buy more vegetables to sell like string beans, eggplants, tomatoes, onion and others. A loan will allow her to improve her stocks, thus attracting more buyers in her store. 

In the future, Juvelyn hopes to make her business more sustainable and profitable. She also wants to save money for the future schooling of her son.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell like string beans, eggplants, tomatoes, onion and others.

loans.name: Lalyn

texts.en:
Lalyn is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She lives in Dulag, Leyte. 

Lalyn is engaged in a food vending business. She sells home cooked foods to the people in her place. She has been in the business for more than 14 years now. 

Lalyn would like to take a loan to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, rice and others. A loan will allow Lalyn to cook more to sell to her customers. 

In the future, Lalyn to be more profitable and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, rice and others

loans.name: Joseph's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Joseph, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. He is 62 years old and, as a group leader, he is representing his group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Joseph is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that he is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why he decided to join in the first place. Joseph says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2012, he has been able to consistently feed his family, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. Joseph will use the profits from this season to buy a cow.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 6.25 acres. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing  solar lights, so with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Shumaila

texts.en:
Shumaila is a 39-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three children. 

Her husband has owned a barber shop for past 30 years. Her husband is the guardian of family and responsible to fulfill the need of all family members.  
Her husband needs to buy different types of items such as creams, hair brushes, blades, shaving creams and other accessories for his barber shop, but due to financial constraints, he is not able to buy these items for his business purpose. 

Therefore, Shumaila has applied for a Kiva loan. This loan will help her husband to buy the relevant items for his business purpose so that he can provide better services to the customers. It will also help him to earn maximum profitable income to fulfill the needs of his business and family.

For this financial assistance, Shumaila is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy items needed in her husband's barber shop.

loans.name: Huda

texts.en:
Huda is 48 years old and lives in Rsaifeh. She is married and has two children.

Huda is very admirable woman, simple and helpful. After her husband retired, he could not cover his family's needs, so Huda decided to help her husband in any way she could. She started her business, which is a mini-market, in one room in her house, to sell a variety of products.

She is working hard to improve their standard of her living. She dreams about own a big supermarket, so she applied for a loan to help her expand her business and buy more products to sell to increase her income and start to achieve her dream step by step.

loans.use: to expand her business and buy more products to sell for increased income.

loans.name: Leonida's Group

texts.en:
Leonida, featured in the above picture, is representing her farming group formed by seven farmers in the Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is 46 years old, and a married mother of seven children; she is often described as a very hardworking individual. 

Although Leonida has been a farmer for more than 30 years, she is new to One Acre Fund and decided to join this year because she really wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Even though she is new to the program, Leonida wanted to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. With the profits earned from this season’s harvest, Leonida hopes to be able to send her children to school.

With this loan, the group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 4 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 4 solar lights, as, even though Leonida decided not to, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Gadir

texts.en:
Gadir is 39 years old, married and has two children. The elder child is 11 years old and goes to fifth class of school. The younger child also is school-aged, and she goes to third class. Gadir is an IDP (internally displaced person) from Fuzuli city who now is living in the Fuzuli region with his lovely family. 

Gadir is a taxi driver. He has been at that business for 11 years. Today Gadir has applied for a loan in the amount of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan new manat) for new tires for his car. He says thanks to Kiva and lenders for support. 

In the future he wants to repair the interior of his car and help his children in education.

loans.use: to buy new tires for his taxi.

loans.name: Sakit

texts.en:
Sakit is 27 years old. Being so young and the only breadwinner in his family, he feels a great responsibility to work a lot, earn a lot, and provide his mother with the best living conditions. His mother is unemployed now and she is a housewife. He combines his work with farming, which also brings some income to his family and solves some financial problems. 

But now he has a health problem and he needs to take a treatment.  This is the reason he decided to requested this loan, to pay his medical expenses.

Please support Sakit.

loans.use: to pay his medical expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for his work.

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en:
Dilfuza is 40 years old and a mother of two children. She lives with her family in the Spitamen region. She engages in agriculture. Her husband helps her. Dilfuza`s elder son has been involved in beekeeping. 

Now Dilfuza wants to start a new business. She wants to purchase cattle and begin her business. Unfortunately, her money is not enough. 

Dilfuza decided to get a loan from Humo. She hopes that with the help of Humo and Kiva lenders she will become one of the best businesswomen in animal husbandry. 

Dilfuza believes in your support.

loans.use: To purchase cattle and start a new business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 20 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de reparación de bicicletas desde hace un año con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el joven vive con su madre en casa de ella, y está solicitando un crédito para la compra de repuestos para bicicletas por mayor ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: This young man's photo has been blurred out, because he is 20 years old and lives in a high risk area. He has owned a bicycle repair shop for a year. With his earnings he is able to pay for some of his household expenses. The young man lives with his mother in her house. He is requesting a loan to buy bicycle spare parts at wholesale prices, because this is his only source of income. This way he will be able to have a better income and a better quality of life, together with his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for bicycles at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to keep having her tortilla business in order to grow financially and improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.en:
Dilafruz is an active woman. She is from the northern part of the country. She is married. She has two children. She was a participant in “Women Entrepreneur Achieve Success” training. Dilafruz successfully participated in the training, and made her business plan for the future of her activity. She is planning to sell plates and dishes. She needs to buy plates and dishes for selling them in her area with a mark-up. 

Dilafruz requested a 15,000 somoni loan for the startup of her business. 

She hopes that Kiva will help her to start her business.

loans.use: to buy plates and dishes

loans.name: Ozoda

texts.en:
Ozoda is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1975. She is living in a remote district. She is married. She has three children. 

Ozoda, with her husband, has a family business. They plant agricultural products in their yard. She has 13 years experience of this kind of business. She likes and knows well her duty. 

Ozoda wants to plant sunflower. She is satisfied doing business in this sphere and gets enough income to cover everyday life expenditures. 

She is asking financial support from Kiva to prepare the land and buy fertilizers and corn for planting. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To prepare the land and buy fertilizers and corn for planting.

loans.name: Rabia Shaheen

texts.en:
Rabia Shaheen is a 40-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three children. Her husband has owned a barber shop for a past 15 years; he is the guardian of family and responsible to fulfill the need of all family members.
 
Her husband needs to buy different types of cosmetics, i.e creams, hair brushes, blades, shaving cream and other accessories for the barber shop, but due to financial constraints, his is not capable of buying these items for his business purposes. 

Therefore, Rabia Shaheen has applied for a Kiva loan. This loan will help her husband to buy the relevant items for his business purposes so that he can provide better services to the customers; it will also be helpful for him to earn the maximum profitable income to fulfill the needs of his business and his family.

Rabia Shaheen is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this assistance.

loans.use: to buy creams, hair brushes, blades, shaving cream and other accessories

loans.name: Arthur's Group

texts.en:
Arthur is a 60-year-old proud father of eight children. He is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing his group of 14 farmers in the Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Arthur has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Arthur described his harvest as very good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Arthur’s Group will be able to plant a total of 10 acres of land and purchase a total of 10 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Magret's Group

texts.en:
Magret is a 45-year-old proud mother of five children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. 

Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Magret has noticed that she has had more profits from each harvest. Magret described her harvest as excellent last year, but she believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have an overall improved quality of life. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to save more money for the future.

With this loan, Magret’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5.75 acres of land and purchase a total of nine solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Shenza Kanwal

texts.en:
Shenza Kanwal is a 25-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of a daughter. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. 

From the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly, so her husband has been unable to generate any amount of income. Her husband wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. 

Therefore Shenza Kanwal has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. 

Shenza Kanwal is so much thankful to Kiva and BRAC  Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 30 years old,married and blessed with four children.Three are attending to school while her youngest child is still an infant.

Rosalinda started her direct-selling business in 2008. Aside from direct selling, she also engages in hog raising as an additional source of family income.

Rosalinda plans to purchase stocks of cosmetic products, underwear and some personal hygiene items to sell, but she doesn't have enough capital. For this reason, she is seeking for a loan of PHP 5,000. With this loan amount, she can keep her business profitable.

loans.use: to buy stocks of cosmetic products, underwear and some personal hygiene items to sell.

loans.name: Tarana

texts.en:
Tarana is married, age 31, and has two children. Her husband is a bus driver. One of her children is a student in collage; the other child is 10 years old and is in fifth class. 

Tarana has been in animal breeding for a long time. She has cows. Tarana produces dairy products (yogurt, cheese, cottage cheese, etc.), then she sells these products and earns money. 

Today she needs a loan to buy cattle to increase her business. Therefore she has applied for a loan in the amount of 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). 

Tarana hopes that this loan will stimulate her business.  She is thankful to partner with Komak company and Kiva for the aid. 

In the future she wants to build a new and big stall to increase her business and monthly income.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Zoila Cecilia

texts.es: Zoila de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatros hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos  desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorara el terreno que muestra en la fotografía.
texts.en: Zoila is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and four children. She has worked growing basic grains for the past several year. She sells her product in the various markets close to her house and with what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control and improve the land.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.en:
Dilorom is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1994. She is living in a remote district. She is single. Dilorom participated in a business planning training. She has experience, sewing women's dresses. 

After training, she is planning to be a sewer and have her own business. She wants to serve women with traditional and beautiful dresses. Dilorom made a business plan of her activity. She is confident and knows that her business will develop. She is goal-oriented and wants to buy equipment and sewing machines for sewing women's dresses. She is asking financial support from KIVA to start up her business.

loans.use: to buy equipment and sewing machines

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.en:
Nargiza is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1988. She is living in a village. She is married. She has three children. She is one of the participants of “Women Entrepreneur – Achieve Success” training. 

Nargiza likes to sew. After training she decided to buy a sewing machine and open her new business. She wants to attract a lot of clients around and new helpers to teach them how to sew. 

She is asking financial support from Kiva to buy a sewing machine. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
60-year-old Alvard lives in Guguarq village. She is mother of a son, mother-in-law and three grandchildren. Her grandchildren attend the local village secondary school, and as Alvard states, they study hard to become good professionals for their motherland. 

To tackle financial hardships, Alvard started her retail business five years ago. She trades with clothing and dressmaking supplies from the house where she lives with her family. 

Now she needs some financial support to acquire a new stock of clothing supplies. 

Her loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of clothing supplies

loans.name: Trufena's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Trufena, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. She is 59 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 10 farmers in the Kakamega North District, Kenya.  She is married and has one child.

Trufena is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again, as this means that she is able to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Trufena says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has learned a lot from farming training, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Trufena will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 7.5 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: James's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is James, often described as an extremely hardworking individual. He is 50 years old and, as a group leader, he is representing his group of 13 farmers in the Kakamega North District, Kenya.  He is married and has four children.

James is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund again as this means that he is able to earn enough to feed his family, which is why he decided to join in the first place. James says that he is happy to have made that decision because, since he first joined in 2013, he has learned a lot from farming training, which has improved his day-to-day life significantly. James will use the profits from this season to save more money for the future.

The group will use this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 9 acres. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of three solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Brendah's Group

texts.en:
Brendah, pictured above, has been a farmer for four years, and is now proud to represent her group of 11 farmers in the Kakamega North District. She is 37 years old, is married, and has six children.

Brendah likes to think of herself as a very hardworking individual. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2014, and decided to represent her group because she wanted to gain leadership skills. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has had more profits from each harvest. Brendah plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Brendah’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 4.5 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light with this loan, the group will also receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Jackline's Group

texts.en:
Jackline's Group has been formed by 16 farmers in the Kakamega North District, and is being represented by Jackline, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 30 years old, is married, and has four children. Jackline has been a farmer for 10 years, and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Jackline isn’t new to One Acre Fund. She actually joined the program in 2013, and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. 

This year, Jackline will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Jackline's Group will purchase a total of 12 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 7.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Josphat's Group

texts.en:
Josphat, pictured above, has been a farmer for 19 years. He is now proud to represent his group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District. He is 41 years old, is married, and has six children.

Josphat likes to think of himself as a very hardworking individual. He has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2014 and decided to represent his group because he wanted to help more farmers. He says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that he has learned a lot from farming trainings. Josphat plans to use the profits from this coming season to save more money for the future.

In total, Josphat’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 5.5 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will also be purchasing a solar light, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 4 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve his harvests of maize

loans.name: John's Group

texts.en:
John's Group consists of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District and is being represented by John, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 67 years old, married, and has four children. John has been a farmer for more than 40 years and is referred to as a very trustworthy person.

John joined One Acre Fund in 2013 and has since noticed his life has changed, especially in the sense that he has learned a lot from farming training sessions. This year he will not only receive fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since he will be able to have an overall improved quality of life.

Using this loan, John's Group will purchase a total of 12 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 8.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar ligh, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Chan Suffan

texts.en:
Chan Suffan is a 48-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of two children. Her husband has been running a general store for past seven years; he is the one who is responsible to fulfill the needs of his entire family. 

Chan Suffan's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities, e.g rice, sugar, tea bags, milk and other consumer items for his business purposes. But due to financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable position to buy all above these products to sell. 

Therefore Chan Suffan has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these commodities and also be helpful for him to earn the maximum profitable income to manage his household and business. 

Chan Suffan is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of commodities, e.g rice, sugar, tea bags, milk and other consumer items for her husband's business

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en:
Rabia is a 29-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of one child. Her husband has been running a general store for the past five years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family. Rabia's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities such as rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other consumer items for his business purpose. But, due to financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable position to buy all of these above products for reselling purpose. Therefore Rabia has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all of these commodities and will also be helpful for him to earn a maximum profitable income to manage his household and business. 

Rabia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband increase his general store business

loans.name: Widjai

texts.en: Widjai is very glad that Kiva lenders helped him realize his dream. He hasn't finished building his house, but soon he will. He repaid his previous loan fully and needs another loan of 8,000 SRD so he can continue his rice production and can save more for his home and for his future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticide

loans.name: Gen

texts.en:
Gen thanks all of his Kiva lenders for supporting him with his rice cultivation business.

The paddy price was low in the previous season, so he could not save much for buying a rice field. But he repaid his loan fully and on-time. To continue with rice production, he lacks finances and asks for another loan of 7,500 SRD.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener  28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This young woman is 28 years old and she lives in a high risk zone, this is why her face is blurred in the photo above. 

She works in agriculture, growing corn which she sells in the various markets close to her home. With what she obtains from these sales, she's able to meet some of her household expenses. She lives in her own home with her life partner.

She's requesting again a loan. She will buy fertilizers, compost, pest control products, herbicides, etc., so that she can generate better income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, pest control products, herbicides, and more.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 60-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of 9 children. 

Her husband has run a general store for 20 years, and is responsible to fulfill the needs of his entire family. Naseem's husband wants to purchase rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other items for his business. But due to financial constraints, her husband is not in the position to buy these products. 

Naseem has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy these commodities and help him to earn maximum profitable income to manage his house hold and business. 

Naseem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's general store business

loans.name: Peter's Group

texts.en:
Peter is a 52-year-old proud father of 8 children. He is a group leader who is described as a very trustworthy person. He represents his group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Peter has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Peter described his harvest as good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to  purchase a solar light, fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have an overall improved quality of life. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Peter’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5 acres of land and purchase a total of 13 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Bakur

texts.en:
Bakur is married and has one child. He drives a taxi, using his own car, to provide transportation service to Yerevan town. He is the main breadwinner of the family. 

Bakur requested a loan, which he will use to pay for the renovation of the car. His loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels. Despite of a number of obstacles and challenges that Bakur and his family face, he works hard to earn a good income and provide appropriate living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of his car

loans.name: Malohat

texts.en:
Malohat is 53 years old, married, and has two children. She is a businesswoman, living in a remote district. She presently works at railway station. She is wise, educated, and honest and wants to see her children educated as well. 

Malohat requested a loan, which she will use to pay her son's university tuition fees. She will repay the loan on time from her salary.

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees

loans.name: Sardar

texts.en:
Sardar  is a 51-year-old married man with  3 children. He retired due to his health; his wife is a teacher at a local school in the village. 

Sardar has raised cattle for  12 years. He tries to earn money to provide income for the family. He selected this work because he enjoys raising cattle. He requests a loan to pay for medical expenses and medicine so he can recover his health and continue his work. After treatment, he wants to take a loan to purchase a few more calves for breeding. 

He needs your financial support.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses and medicine.

loans.name: Tazeem Akhter

texts.en:
Tazeem Akhter is a 49-year-old woman who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her 3 children. Her husband has worked in the public sector  for many years and  is responsible for meeting the needs of the family. Tazeem Akhter provides sewing services to earn an income to contribute to the house hold expenses.
 
She needs needles, thread, fabric, machine oil,  and other items for her business, but does not have the funds to purchase these accessories. Therefore she has applied for  Kiva loan from BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase these items and help her to increase monthly sales and profits.

Tazeem Akhter is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her tailoring business.

loans.name: Rani Bibi

texts.en:
Rani bibi is a 34-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of five children. Her husband has been running a general store for the past one year; her husband is solely responsible to fulfill the needs of his entire family. 

Rani bibi's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities, e.g., rice, sugar, tea bags, milk and other consumer items for his business purpose, but due to financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable position to buy all these products for reselling purposes. Therefore, Rani bibi has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her husband to buy all these commodities and also will be helpful for him to earn maximum profitable income to manage his household and business. 

Rani bibi is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase the commodities at her husband's general store

loans.name: John's Group

texts.en:
John's Group has 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, he  is the group's leader. He is 29 years old, married, and has 2 children. John has been a farmer for 10 years and is a very hardworking individual.

John isn’t new to One Acre Fund, he  joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed his life has changed; especially in the sense that he has been able to save more money. This year, John will get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited because he will be able to have light during the night and have somewhere to charge his phone.

John's Group will purchase a total of 11 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 5.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, hybrid seeds, and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Las Reinas Del Norte Group

texts.es:
Lenny es una mujer de 33 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 4 hijos de 7, 9, 11 y 13 años y su negocio es la carpintería.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, fuerte, constante, responsable y trabajadora, su negocio lo desarrolla de forma ambulante en la zona ‘Mutualista’ un área céntrica que alberga a edificios de comercios, públicos, universidades, escuelas y todo tipo de áreas comerciales, de clima cálido tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 18-35 grados centígrados.
Lenny es de tez morena, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y hable español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (la primera de la izquierda, viste blusa negra). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se encarga de la elaboración de muebles y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa alquilada que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su necesidad por mejorar sus ingresos ampliando su negocio la llevo a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de bisutería, venta de comida, venta de almohadas, venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de papa, venta de jugos y venta de gafas, para solicitar un préstamo, ampliar sus negocios y mejorar sus ingresos. Su negocio es la carpintería, actividad que realiza su esposo en cuanto a la obra de mano; para que ella se encargue de la venta. Ella ambula por el centro de la ciudad con una silla, o mueble pequeño para exponerlo, los clientes se acercan a preguntar el precio y ella cotiza el juego de sillas de 6 unidades o una docena, realizando la venta y les da la dirección del taller de carpintería donde se encuentra su pareja trabajando. “mi negocio es un trabajo en equipo, me encargo de cotizar y realizar la venta para que vayan al taller donde está mi pareja y él les realiza la entrega del mueble, que puede ser un juego de dormitorio, comedor, sillas y todo lo que se pueda fabricar con madera…” comenta. Su sueño es abrir una tienda de muebles para exponer sus trabajos y dejar de ambular, ella desea realizar la compra de madera para la fabricación de muebles para cumplir con sus pedidos. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 16 años que se dedica a esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Lenny solicita un préstamo para la compra de madera para cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lenny is 33 years old and lives with her partner. She has 4 children aged 7, 9, 11 and 13. Her business is carpentry. She is a good mother, enterprising, strong, consistent, responsible and hard-working. She does her business itinerantly in the ‘Mutualista’ neighborhood, a central area that houses office buildings, universities, schools and all types of commercial areas. It has a tropical climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 18 to 35 degrees Celsius.

Lenny is dark-skinned and has long black hair that she ties back, dark eyes and thin. Her native language is Guaraní that she speaks in her family and she speaks Spanish because of the general culture and for her business. (she is the first on the left, wearing a black blouse)

She shares her life with her partner who works making furniture and her children who study in school. They lives in a rented house that has water, electricity and sewage. Her need to improve her income by expanding her business led her to head a communal bank with businesses like selling jewellery, selling food, the sale of pillows, the sale of used clothing, selling potatoes, selling juice and the sales of gloves, to request a loan, expand their businesses and improve their income.

Her business is carpentry, a business where her husband does the labor and she takes care of sales. She goes through the center of the city with a chair or small table to exhibit it. Clients come up and ask the price and she lists it for a set of 6 or 12 chairs. Making the sale she directs them to the carpentry workshop where her partner is working. "My business is working in a team. I am in charge of pricing and making the sale so they can go to the shop where my partner is. He gives them the furniture, which could be a bedroom set, dining room table, chairs...anything that can be made from wood..." she comments.

Her dream is to open a furniture store to display the work, not having to walk around. She wants to make the purchase of wood to make furniture to fill orders. This is her second loan with the institution in the 16 years that she has done this work independently. For these reasons Lenny is requesting a loan to buy wood to fill the requests from customers.

loans.use: to buy wood to fill clients orders.

loans.name: Tabriz

texts.en:
Tabriz is 54-year-old married man. He works as a construction worker, where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely enough to cover all the family's needs. 

By taking this loan, he wants to improve the family's living conditions and pay his medical expenses. He hopes that Kiva will be able to help him. Please support him.

loans.use: to pay his medical expenses

loans.name: Claudia Mariela

texts.es:
Claudia, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado de educación básica, está casada y su esposo trabaja de vendedor de plásticos; tiene dos hijos que aún viven en casa con ella.

Claudia, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de dos años y lo aprendió de sus padres y decidió hacerlo para buscar un ingreso económico extra, para ayudar en los gastos del hogar.- La distancia que camina para llegar hasta el potrero es de 2 kilómetros.

Claudia, necsita el dinero para comprar ganado de repasto, con esta compra ella logrará aumentar la cantidad de ganado y le permitirá obtener mayores ganancias y no tendrá que depender solo del dinero que gana su esposo,

Sus sueños son tener fuerzas para seguir trabajando y poder darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos y que tenga la oportunidad de prepararse académicamente.
texts.en:
Claudia is 29 years old and studied up to Grade 7 of basic education. She is married and her husband works as a plastics vendor. She has two children who live at home with her.

Claudia works with cattle. she has done this for two years and she learned this from her parents and decided to do it to make an additional economic income to help with the household expenses. The distance she walks to the pasture is 2 km.

Claudia needs the money to buy cattle. With this purchase she will increase the number of cattle she has. This will allow her to obtain more income and not have to solely depend on the money her husband makes. Her dream is to have the strength to continue working and provide her children a good future and have the opportunity to prepare academically.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Manar

texts.en:
Manar is an ambitious lady with willpower. She is 19 years old, single, and lives in Southern Ghour. Manar could not complete her studies because of the financial problems faced by her father.

Because she does not want to see her siblings unable to complete their studies, she decided to help her father. Therefore, she opened a small shop for food supplies. Now Manar wants to improve her business, so she applied for a loan to expand her shop and to buy more products to sell.

She need your help to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to expand her shop and to buy more products to sell

loans.name: Meline

texts.en:
Meline is the mother of two children: a 14-year-old daughter (also in the photo) and 9-year-old son.
 
Meline started her work as a hairdresser five years ago. She works from her house, and is the only hairdresser in the village. Besides her work as a hairdresser, Meline also is involved in a retail business. Specifically, she trades in clothing. Meline's undertaking was successful; it has been three years and a half since she efficiently implemented her trade.
 
Now, she needs financial resources to purchase tools and materials for her hairdressing service and a spring collection of clothes to resell. Her loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business startup loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

loans.use: to pay for tools and materials for her hairdressing service and a spring collection of clothes to resell

loans.name: Israel Alberto

texts.es:
Israel, de 19 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltero y no tiene pareja ni hijos, solo vive con su mamá y un hermano. 

Israel, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, solo tiene cuatro meses de realizar este oficio y lo aprendió de un amigo.- La distancia que camina para llegar hasta donde está el ganado es de 2 kilómetros.

Israel, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado de repasto, con estó generará mayores ganancias y mejorará su calidad de vida.

Su sueño es seguir trabajar de esta manera, hasta lograr tener una ganadería grande, para darle mejores condiciones de vida a su futura familia.
texts.en:
Israel, age 19, went to school through high school.  He is single, and he does not have a life partner or children.  He lives only with his mother and a brother.

Israel works with grazing cattle.  He has only been engaged in this trade for four months.  He learned it from a friend.  He walks two kilometers to get to where the cattle are.

Israel needs the loan to buy grazing cattle.  With this he will generate greater earnings and improve his quality of life.

His dream is to continue working in this way until he manages to have a large cattle business so that he can give better living conditions to his future family.

loans.use: to buy grazing cattle.

loans.name: Jose Gilberto

texts.es:
José, de 46 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales solo dos viven en casa, la mayor está acompañada. 

José, trabaja con ganado bovino de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de 6 años y lo aprendió de su padre; decidió hacerlo como principal fuente de ingresos para su familia, también trabaja la agricultura y antes solo era jornalero.- La distancia de donde está el ganado es de 3 cuadras de su casa.

José, necesita el préstamo para alquilar un terreno para mantener a su ganado, con esto solventará los problemas que tenia, porque el ganado entraba a terrenos ajenos, pero al tener un lugar en donde puede dejarlos encerrados, estará más transquilo. 

Sus sueños son trabajar lo mejor que pueda para poder darles un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
José, age 46, went to school through the third grade.  He is in a relationship, and his life partner works doing the household chores.  He has three children, but only two of them live at home.  The oldest is in a relationship.

José works with grazing cattle.  He has done this for over six years.  He learned it from his father.  He decided to do it as his main source of income for his family.  He also works in agriculture.  Before that he was only a day worker.  The cattle are located three blocks from his house.

José needs the loan to rent land to maintain his livestock.  With this he will solve the problems that he had because the cattle were going on other people’s property.  Having an enclosed place where he can leave them will be less worrisome.

His dream is to work the best that he can in order to be able to give his family a better future.

loans.use: to rent land to maintain his cattle.

loans.name: Afshaan

texts.en:
Afshaan is a responsible mother of four children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for seven years. Her husband is responsible to fulfill the needs of entire family. 

Her husband needs to do maintenance on his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good; it requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, her husband is unable to perform the maintenance on his taxi. Therefore, Afshaan has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Afshaan's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn profitable income. 

Afshaan also plans to make savings with the profit amount of her husband's income to meet her family's needs in future.

Afshaan is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi

loans.name: Nazneen

texts.en:
